channel.title: How to start modelling? [REQ] I got the datmaker 1.37b
channel.description: Can anyone help me how to model like, change the items look color etc, i got some models from another client of mine but idk how to change the color/looks of them and stuff

item.title: How to start modelling? [REQ] I got the datmaker 1.37b
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

you have to convert them to .mqo in datmaker. if it is an armor and it has animation as like it moves with the character. you convert it to .mqov2 which will keep the animation for you. in .mqo just change the colors as you see fit. in mqo2 do nothing to the Tskin Vskin1 or Pri only change the first one. if you need more help or dont understand, just post your question and i or any other modelers will help

Read full topic
item.source: How to start modelling? [REQ] I got the datmaker 1.37b
